description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% bleeding duration; when you are downed, you create a death nova. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>

bonuses: 50% chance when struck to summon a jagged horror. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of the Traveler

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of the Flock

bonuses: 15% chance when struck to summon a bird to strike the attacking foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When the summoned bird strikes a foe, it also inflicts blindness for 5 seconds.
When you use a heal skill, you and nearby allies are healed for a small amount. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>

bonuses: +2% damage against foes with less than 50% health.

When struck below 20% health, cloak for 4 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of Mercy

bonuses: Gain up to 400 toughness while reviving an ally, based on your level.
You resurrect allies with 30% more health.

bonuses: 15% chance when struck to cause your next attack to steal life. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 25s)</c>
After using your healing skill, your next attack skill steals health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When struck below 25% health, you steal health from nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 40s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +15% might duration; 25% chance when struck to gain might for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5s)</c>

bonuses: 25% chance when struck to gain fury for 15 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of Speed

bonuses: 25% chance when struck to gain swiftness for 15 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>

bonuses: +6% damage against targets with less than 50% health.
